entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers and periods of wet snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
